name: Transit Treasure
overview:
Transit Treasure runs a first-of-its kind loyalty rewards program designed specifically for users of public transportation. Transit Treasure is free to join and members earn “Transit Miles” for using public transportation and for every dollar they spend with Transit Treasure’s online and local merchant partners. Transit Miles are redeemable for cash.

At the end of each week, Transit Treasure members are emailed a calendar which they use to report their transit use for the week. If, during the course of a month, a member has taken over 30 rides using public transit they earn 100 Transit Miles. Our members then have an additional thirty days to “claim” their Transit Miles by spending at least $30 with our merchant partners. For every dollar spent above $30 members earn an additional Transit Mile. For example, if a member used public transit 40 times in January and purchased a $50 gift card to purchase food for the month, they would earn 120 Transit Miles for January.

Our merchant partners include over 300 brand-name merchants including: the Gap, Best Buy, Macy’s, Sephora, Dick’s Sporting Goods, Nordstrom, Toys R Us and Office Depot.

Transit Treasure operates in 27 of the most popular transit riding cities in North America including: New York, Washington, DC, Boston, Chicago, San Francisco, Los Angeles and Toronto.
